Great, nice and easy win today over Arsenal. Icing on the cake was @cesc4official late goal. @hazardeden10 solo effort was amazing #CHEARS

I wonder if @WWE will go with @TripleH vs. @SamoaJoe for #Wrestlemania instead? So tough on @WWERollins though
So unfortunate for @WWERollins to suffer another knee injury, so close to #Wrestlemania too. Hoping for a speedy recovery
#ThankYouIvanovic for all the great memories in your 9 year stay with us. Above all, the goal against Napoli stands out as the best #KTBFFH
Disappointed not to win, but after Arsenal's loss and Spurs dropping points this is an incredible result #LIVCHE #KTBFFH
Great first half from @ChelseaFC. Absorbed @LFC pressure and counter. Excellent free kick from @DavidLuiz_4 #Geezer #KTBFFH #LIVCHE
@Keristian1229 @ProWrestlingMag He's debuted there to make us believe he won't cost Cena in the Chamber
Good luck to @ChelseaFC tonight. Lets get those 3 points. Hope the away fans make some noise, get home safely #CFC #LIVCHE #KTBFFH
@TheBluesHQ 4 points will do nicely
#DeadlineDay is a bit like Arsenal - Promises a lot, but delivers very little
Even happier Liverpool got knocked out now lol https://t.co/hsTkEinPHT

Ivanovic came to Chelsea as an unknown and leaves as a legend who won everything with the club. All the best for the future #CFC
Team I'd play against Liverpool: Courtois. Azpilicueta Luiz Cahill (c). Moses Fabregas Kante Alonso. Pedro Costa Hazard #CFC #KTBFFH
If this is the Main event of #Wrestlemania33 I wouldn't be bothered. Strange choice, but they work well together https://t.co/N64eugYtqH
As the fans were chanting "Samoa", Vince got the wrong end of the stick and sent out the first Samoan he could find in Reigns #RoyalRumble
Why not Sutton away? A nice romantic tie #FACup https://t.co/nJsolhJ9r7
Not the greatest of #RoyalRumble matches. Strange choice for a winner. Best part was @Goldberg flattening @BrockLesnar again
Now that was awesome! #WWEChampionship #RoyalRumble #16times
The WWE Cruiserweight division is a surefire cure for insomnia #RoyalRumble
That was a fun match, but didn't like the ending. Makes Owens look weak yet again. Not looking forward to Strowman/Reigns feud #RoyalRumble
A decent opener to the #RoyalRumble but a rather flat finish. Is anyone ever gonna beat @MsCharlotteWWE on PPV?
Who do you think will win the #RoyalRumble? @RandyOrton @WWEBrayWyatt #Undertaker @FinnBalor
Looks like @realDonaldTrump is going insane with the decisions he's making. He must be an @Arsenal fan. Only way to explain it lol
Is it just me or does @WWENXT now just resemble a better production of @IMPACTWRESTLING #nxttakeoversanantonio #NXTTakeOver
@ProWrestlingMag WWE will probably swerve us and have Wyatt win it
Good game today. Always nice to score goals and progress in the cup. And Liverpool are out. Happy days lol #CHEBRE #FACup #CFC #KTBFFH
On my way to London, can't pass the Slough trading estate without thinking of Brent @rickygervais lol
What an ending to last night's episode of #EastEnders. So Max set up the crash to kill everyone only to play the hero & save them? Okay then
@JrbcfcJames I love Taker so I'm biased haha. Most obvious choice too unless Balor can make a shocking comeback. Expect Joe to cost Cena
Brilliant. At least the FA didn't back down https://t.co/GmGOvHunsT
The Undertaker https://t.co/lmZANUomcC
@LiibbyBee Charming lol. I'm a non-drinker
Chelsea team I'd play against Brentford: Begovic. Ake Terry (c) Zouma. Ivanovic Fabregas Chalobah Pedro. Willian Batshuayi Loftus-Cheek #CFC
@_Inno Haha we've all had nighmares against Barca, don't worry
@_Inno Haha yeah I saw you against Man City, very impressive. Not so much against Barca lol
@_Inno Yeah I'd like to see them in this league. But I know that's not what most Scottish fans would want. Their league needs improving
@_Inno Yeah I can see that. Brendan doing what's needed though. Would be better if Celtic could play in our league, or not? Lol
@_Inno Yeah Dembele looks promising. I don't watch much Scottish football tbh, just look out for the scores more than anything
@_Inno I forgot you had Virgil too. That guy is arguably the best defender in the PL right now. Would love him. You're doing well though
@_Inno I agree there. Need better than that at Chelsea though and we've had some bad back-up keepers. Forster is awesome
@_Inno Haha brilliant! I've seen what he's like in the Premier League, no thanks. But he's doing well for you
Thank God for that https://t.co/BHszTllpRX
@antoniocontes Haha I see. Yeah, need to watch the game somehow
@antoniocontes How come?
It's a shame if Ivanovic does leave Chelsea. He's been a warrior for us for so many years. If I was him, I'd wait to get another PL Title
Big congratulations to @brendanMrsBrown on winning Best Comedy. Truly deserved. Makes aspiring writers strive to be just as good #NTAS
@InnerN3rd It will go down in history as being the greatest of all time, trust me
Mourinho does love trying to play mind games, bless him. Shame for him no one cares because his "mighty club" are a lowly 6th in the table
Looking forward to the #NTAS tonight. Best of luck to @bbceastenders and @tillykeeper
@chelstar1972 @bbceastenders Haha, yeah whoever's under that bus isn't going to survive it being dropped on them again and again lol
I got 11 out of 12. Would've got them all right had the first question not been a trick one! #CFC https://t.co/9afBNZ2rxf
Incredible episode of @bbceastenders. Amazing performances from all. Beautifully shot too. Best episode award is in the bag #eastenders
Such an iconic picture and end to #Raw https://t.co/3XWDy8t3bY
The Cadbury's Premier League. Something doesn't taste right to me...
Drama. Suspense. Explosions. @bbceastenders at its very best. Guessing that market will have to move after all #eastenders
With the #Wweroyalrumble just six days away, who do you think is most likely to make a surprise appearance in the match? #Balor #Angle
If @ChelseaFC can get past Liverpool and Arsenal undefeated then there's pretty much no one that can stop us. I'd take 2 draws now #CFC
If you haven't watched @bbceastenders recently (because it's been so dull) give it a look tonight. Get ready for something truly special
Wenger's shove on the 4th official was about as weak as their title challenge, but he deserves a touchline ban for it #ARSvBUR
Thoughts are with @RyanMason and his family. Hope he pulls through. Horrific challenge. Just hoping he makes a full recovery #CHEHUL
A vital win for us. 8 points clear. @diegocosta awesome. @HullCity played well. Hope @RyanMason is okay too, nasty collision #CHEHUL
Great goal from @diegocosta who hopefully shuts up the press. He's here to stay #CHEHUL #Diego #KTBFFH
Good luck to @ChelseaFC, lets celebrate @diegocosta's 100th game for us in style with victory #CHEHUL #CFC #KTBFFH
@ChelseaFC Awesome news, @diegocosta starts! #CFC #CHEHUL
3 Points against Hull and this will be the perfect weekend #CFC #CHEHUL #KTBFFH

What a win for @SwansOfficial. If @ChelseaFC win tomorrow, that's @LFC out of the race. Now let's hope City beat Spurs today #LIVSWA

So to sum up, Costa faked an injury, had major bust up with staff and players, demanded move to China. In reality, he twinged his back #CFC
All that nonsense about Costa in the press, never believed a word of it. He's Chelsea through and through and will fire us to the title #CFC
A huge congratulations to @RealKurtAngle on entering the @WWE #HallOfFame. Truly deserving. A bonafide legend of sports entertainment
Which of these legends would you like to see back at @ChelseaFC the most? @Ballack @didierdrogba #Lampard #CFC #KTBFFH
Can't wait for @anthonyfjoshua to clash with @Klitschko at @wembleystadium. Going to be a great year of boxing #joshuaklitschko
Never thought I'd see a Klopp team sit ten behind the ball, but we saw it at Old Trafford yesterday. And they still conceded #MNULIV

4-0 to Everton lol. Pep will be shaking his head wondering how his team could lose despite having more of the ball haha #EVEMCI
